metadata.title: CVE-2019-9022 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in PHP 7.x before 7.1.26, 7.2.x before 7.2.14, and7.3.x before 7.3.2. dns_get_record misparses a DNS response, which canallow a hostile DNS server to cause PHP to misuse memcpy, leading to readoperations going past the buffer allocated for DNS data. This affectsphp_parserr in ext/standard/dns.c for DNS_CAA and DNS_ANY queries.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-9022` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-php7.0 - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
libphp7.0-embed - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
php7.0 - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
php7.0-bcmath - 7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.2

criterions.comment: php7.0 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.0.33-0ubuntu0.16.04.2').
